channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The 7 Best Automatic Litter Boxes (2025) Our Cats Would Recommend
item.description: With these high-tech automatic litter boxes, gone are the days of scooping and smells. Welcome to the future.

item.title: Target Darts Omni Auto Scoring System Hits the Mark
item.description: Step up to the oche and hit the bull’s-eye with this automatic darts scoring system for online play.

item.title: ‘Industry’ season 4 captures tech fraud better than any show on TV right now
item.description: This latest season of the TV show Industry takes a look at the world of money and power through the eyes of a fintech baron.

item.title: 4 Best Website Builders (2026), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Don't fuss around with files and servers. Just use one of these WIRED-tested website builders.

item.title: Sony's Biggest QLED Screens See Big Discounts This Weekend
item.description: You can grab a lower price on some of Sony's biggest QLED panels.

item.title: Benchmark raises $225M in special funds to double down on Cerebras
item.description: Benchmark Capital has been an investor in the Nvidia rival since 2016.

item.title: The Technologies Changing How You’ll Watch the 2026 Winter Olympic Games
item.description: From drones with “first-person” visualization to real-time 360-degree replays and Olympics GPT, get ready to immerse yourself in the Winter Games in M...

item.title: An AI startup founder says he’s planning a ‘March for Billionaires’ in protest of California’s wealth tax
item.description: The organizer of the event swears it's not a joke.

item.title: From Svedka to Anthropic, brands make bold plays with AI in Super Bowl ads
item.description: From the first AI-generated Big Game ad courtesy of Svedka to Anthropic's beef with OpenAI, here are the biggest ads from Super Bowl LX.

item.title: Apple is working to make CarPlay compatible with AI chatbots like ChatGPT
item.description: Apple engineers are working to support AI chatbot apps over the next few months.
